name: Endless Inside
description:
Endless Inside mix free exploration mode and different countdown survive modes where the player will have to solve and discover the secrets of an old art university. Get ready to solve puzzles and hide to survive. On this place you will meet all beings who are waiting to get revenge and know about them to understand the story.Features:
  • 6 playable phases different to each other
  • 3 alternate endings depending what you do
  • Extra survive mode to play an extra secret phase to discover one of the last secrets
  • Hidden secrets around the place to discover by your own


Updates of this game will be free after your first purchase.
